## ğŸ¯ What I Built

**A2A Service Purchase on Solana** - A fully autonomous agent-to-agent service marketplace demo with REAL on-chain transactions.

Two agents (Agent A and Agent B) communicate entirely through Solana blockchain:
- Agent A requests a SHA256 hash service
- Pays 0.1 SOL on-chain
- Agent B executes the service
- Returns result via Solana Memo Program
- Agent A verifies and publishes cryptographic proof

All 3 transactions are permanently recorded on Solana devnet!
